name: 4th Street Stairs
description: Near the Entrada and Ocean bus stop is the 4th Street Stairs. Go up to Adelaide Drive.

name: Across The Greek
description: Across the Greek, start at the trailhead of Vermont Canyon Road. Go up the trail until you pass a trashcan at the top.

name: Arbor Hill
description: Start at the intersection of Arbor St and California Terrace. Go to the top of Arbor and Grand.

name: Berlin Forest
description: From the Griffith Parking lot away from the observatory, go up the trail until you see a sign that says 'Berlin Forest'

name: Bench To Observatory
description: Go down the path near the Griffith observatory entrance for 3 hills. When you make it to the bench, that is the starting point. Go up from the bench to the observatory.

name: Bin To Bench
description: Go down the path near the Griffith observatory entrance for 3 hills. Go down to the bench and then left until you get to a paved road and bin. From here, go up back to the bench. This is part of the Boy Scout Trail

name: California Incline
description: A Santa Monica classic. Start by the sign near the stairs and head up the California Incline.

name: Culver City Stairs
description: From the Baldwin Hills Scenic Overlook Trailhead, head to the top! You can go up the steps or up the Hillside Trail.

name: Entrada Steps to Mabery
description: Near the intersection of Entrada and Mesa is a staircase. Go up that to Mabery.

name: Griffith's Nasty Hill
description: Off W Observatory road and accross the S-Curve, from the road go up the steep climb To Mt. Hollywood Trail

name: Griffth's S-Curve
description: On the W trail, start at a tree on a little bridge and head up the S curve towards the road. If you keep going from the road, you'll start the Nasty Hill section.

name: Hollywood Bowl Entrance up the steps to the tree
description: At the base of the steps by the tunnel, head up the steps until you make it to the tree in front of the store.

name: Hollywood Bowl B Parking Lot B1-B7-B1
description: In the Hollywood Bowl B parking lot, go to either side of B1, head up to B7 and back to B1. It'll be a U shape. You can start from either side of B1 and head to the other side as 1 rep.

name: Hollywood Bowl Picnic Area 3
description: In the Hollywood Bowl A parking lot is a hill that goes up to Picnic Area 3. Go up that hill.

name: Hollywood Bowl Walkway to Lot A Upper Terrace
description: Towards the corner of the Hollywood Bowl A lot is an upper walkway. Go up the walkway to Lot A Upper Terrace.

name: Idaho Steps and Incline
description: Near the Santa Monica Beach Path and California Incline is a circular base ramp. Go up that. Instead of going up the California Incline, go up the steps on your right and follow the incline to the top. If you back down and get to the start of the California Incline, this is an opportunity to knock out a rep of two locations.

name: La Loma to Cherry Steps to Top of Sequoia Light Post
description: Near the intersection of La Loma road and Juniper Dr are two staircases. Go up the steps to cherry Drive. Keep going up the street on Sequioa Drive until you get to the lightpost.

name: La Loma to Evergreen Steps
description: Near the intersection of La Loma road and Juniper Dr are two staircases. Go up the steps to Evergreen Drive.

name: Montana Steps
description: Near the Santa Monica Beach Path and California Incline is a circular ramp. Go up that. Instead of going up the California Incline, go up the steps on your right and follow the incline to the top. If you back down and get to the start of the California Incline, this is an opportunity to knock out a rep of two locations.

name: Paramount Stairway
description: Near the Hollywood Bowl, go up the steps to the top

name: Santa Monica Beach Path to Cannon Steps
description: Off the Santa Monica Beach Path is a set of steps. Go up it until you see the Cannon. Don't fire the cannon.

name: Santa Monica Pier Ramp
description: At the base of the Santa Monica Pier ramp, head up.

name: Santa Monica Stairs
description: At the intersection of Amalfi and Entrada is the Santa Monica Stairs. Go up to Adelaide Drive.

name: Steps to Arizona and Ocean
description: Off the Santa Monica Beach Path closer to the freeway is a set of steps. Go up the steps to the top.

name: Secret Stairs of Pasadena (Option A)
description: Near the intersection of Elmwood Drive and Laurel Bay Drive is a staircase. Go through the Elmwood Secret Stairs until you get to Cherry Drive.

name: Secret Stairs of Pasadena (Option B)
description: This is the reverse of Secret Stairs of Pasadena (Option A). Start at Cherry Drive, go through the Elmwood Secret Stairs until you get to Elmwood Drive.

name: Sign to Bench
description: Go down the path near the Griffith observatory entrance for 3 hills. Go down to the bench and then right until you see a sign. For this segment, go up until you make it back to the bench.
